description: Trading and algorithmic trading platform (stock markets, forex, bitcoins and options).

SmartCOM. Extended quote price check.
Plaza. Multi connections.
Storage. Volume-less ticks support.
SampleHistoryTesting. ES mini test.
ChartPanel.Save fix.
Leve1 -> Ticks + Candles.

ILogListener. Implements IDisposable
IQFeed. Candle timezone fix.
NewsSerializer fix.
NewsGrid. Request story + open url.
IQFeed. News fixes.

MarketEmulator. Fill server time.

SampleRealTimeEmulation. Look up securities.
SampleRealTimeEmulation. IQFeed support.
TraderHelper.ToDecimal fix.
ISecurityStorage. CSV implementation.
ICandleBuilder. Direct value processing.
Correlation indicator.
Covariance indicator.
Chart.TimeZone
Oanda + BitStamp. Control error count.
WpfToolkit 2.5.0
FixServer. Error handling fix.
Fix http://stocksharp.com/forum/yaf_postst5724_QuikLua--System-InvalidOperationException-pri-poluchienii-ordierov-biez-transactionId.aspx
Plaza. CGate router 1.3.12.5

Interactive Brokers. 9.72
Backtesting on level1.

Chart fix (draw values in hidden mode).

title: StockSharp API (S#.API)
